Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Authorizes up to two percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for youth team sports funding
Summary: Authorizes up to two percent of mobile sports tax revenue, but not more than twenty million dollars, be used for youth team sports funding to be distributed by county youth bureaus, city of New York's department of youth and community development, and Laureus Sport for Good Foundation USA.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing up to two percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for youth team sports funding
